name: A.i.Cannons
description: The obvious objective would be to destroy all of the A.i. enemy cannons. To ease the experience there will be a counter. After destroying all of them, you will be awarded a "Winning" screen! Unfortunately, the A.i. will give as good as they get, so you will need to take care of your armor by shielding, bumping obstacles and navigating a tricky maze-like war zone! Not graphically violent! So it is fun, point and shoot for everyone. Have fun!
